channel.title: Opencv on Dan Aukes
channel.description: Recent content in Opencv on Dan Aukes

item.title: Installing OpenCV
item.description: install opencv for python sudo apt update sudo apt install python3-opencv # may be done already depending on what you installed.

item.title: CV Bridge and Python 3
item.description: getting cv_bridge working with python 3 is less straightforward. you need to recompile cv_bridge locally.

item.title: OpenCV Photobooth
item.description: A qt5 gui and opencv make it possible to make your own photobooth at home!
